ISSUE.TITLE: New Project button
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: NocoDB used as docker : true NocoDB version : 0.11.6 Node: **v12.22.1** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** Database: **mysql2** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.11.6** **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Install new istance by docker 2. Open dashboard with Chome 92.0.4515.107 on MacOS 11.5.1 3. You don't see the "New Project" button / just tried to clean browser cache 4. With Firefox 90 on same Mac, no problem **Screenshots**
